titles.title: A resolution celebrating the 75th anniversary of the dedication of the Hoover Dam.
A resolution celebrating the 75th anniversary of the dedication of the Hoover Dam.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary has been expanded because action occurred on the measure.)
Celebrates the 75th anniversary of the dedication of the Hoover Dam.
Recognizes the benefits of the construction of that dam to the agricultural, industrial, and urban development of the Southwestern United States.
